column2: ggplotly(ggplot(data,aes(x=Income,y=PropertyValue,color=as.factor(No_kids),size=as.factor(No_kids)))+geom_point()+geom_smooth(method = 'lm')+labs(title = "Scatter plot Income  VS Property Value",x="Income", y = "Property Value",color="Kids No",size="Kids No")+theme(plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0.5,face = "bold",color = "black")))
Using size for a discrete variable is not advised.
